trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_AURVAEL_000_000<tab>Adventure! Excitement! Glory! All that and more awaits you in the Diadem. Should you crave such delights in the depth of your soul, pray return to me when you have honed your skills.
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>In order to embark upon an Ishgardian exploratory mission, you and your party must meet the following requirements:
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>※You must have completed the main scenario quest “Heavensward.”
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>You must be a level 60 Disciple of War or Magic.

TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>To review your quest progression, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from the main menu, followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Journal<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_AURVAEL_000_010<tab>Excellent timing, my good <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>! We seek volunteers for our next expedition. Will you be joining us?
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_Q1_000_000<tab>What would you like to do?
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_A1_000_001<tab>Register for an Ishgardian exploratory mission.
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_A1_000_002<tab>Ask about Ishgardian exploratory missions.
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_A1_000_003<tab>Ask about rewards obtained during exploratory missions.
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_A1_000_004<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_AURVAEL_000_100<tab>You have the opportunity to stand at the forefront of a grand initiative and explore a new frontier: the Diadem!
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_AURVAEL_000_101<tab>But know that you will face many difficulties. Why, the damn aether currents are so unstable that you have to attune to them every time...
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>In order to register for an exploratory mission, you must be a level 60 Disciple of War or Magic.

TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_SYSTEM_000_101<tab>Furthermore, you must be in possession of a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>mission ceruleum voucher<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, which may be purchased from Jaquoinie, the mission quartermaster.

TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_SYSTEM_000_102<tab>Please be advised that preformed parties with less than eight players must abide by the composition requirement of one tank, two healers, and five DPS.
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_SYSTEM_100_102<tab>However, please note that these role requirements may only be enforced for exploratory missions to the Diadem Hunting Grounds.
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_SYSTEM_000_103<tab>Moreover, please note that the loot rules for matched parties prohibit the selection of Need.
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_SYSTEM_000_104<tab>Exploratory missions are limited to 30, 45, or 60 minutes (Earth time), depending on the difficulty selected.

TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_SYSTEM_100_104<tab>Furthermore, please be advised that you will not be permitted to change to a Disciple of the Land or Hand while on an exploratory mission to the Diadem Hunting Grounds.
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_SYSTEM_000_105<tab>All items in a player's loot list will automatically be transferred to that player's inventory upon all other party members leaving the area.
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_SYSTEM_000_106<tab>Items unable to be obtained will be lost.
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_SYSTEM_000_107<tab>Please note that once you have participated in an exploratory mission, you may not do so again for 30 minutes (Earth time).

TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_AURVAEL_000_200<tab>Oh, you never know what you might find out there, especially considering the number of expeditions being mounted by free companies and sky pirates─many of which fail miserably and are forced to withdraw.

TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_AURVAEL_000_201<tab>Aye, people are dying out there. Greenhorns and seasoned veterans alike. And while that is a tragedy, it may be another's boon, for if they have forged a strong spiritbond with their gear, it may become infused with the wearer's aether upon his death, rendering it that much more powerful.

TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_AURVAEL_000_202<tab>What I find fascinating though is the tremendous variety to be found. Ah, but I suppose it is the inevitable result of glamour prisms becoming so popular with adventurers.
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_AURVAEL_000_203<tab>In any case, should you have no need of these items, House Haillenarte would be most grateful for the contribution.
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_AURVAEL_000_204<tab>Our spoils traders will recompense you for any such gear with sky pirate spoils. Mayhap you are unfamiliar with the currency?

TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_AURVAEL_000_205<tab>They are trophies, after a fashion. Items taken from the airships raided in the Sea of Clouds. A bit barbaric, perhaps, but as they are already in common use... <sigh>

TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_AURVAEL_000_206<tab>And should you wish to part with your newfound spoils, you may exchange them for an assortment of goods by speaking with one of our spoils collectors.

TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>Certain gear obtained during the course of an exploratory mission can be exchanged for <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>brass sky pirate spoils<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> by speaking with spoils traders in Ishgard, the Diadem, or in any residential district.

TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_SYSTEM_100_001<tab>Moreover, Disciples of the Land can gather <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>steel sky pirate spoils<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the Diadem.

TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_SYSTEM_100_002<tab>These spoils can then be redeemed for a variety of valuable goods by speaking with spoils collectors, who can be found in the company of spoils traders.
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDENTRANCE_00311_SYSTEM_000_200<tab>You cannot register for an exploratory mission while using the Duty Finder.
